bio: ğŸ‘‹ Hi I'm Pascal, a passionate security engineer, builder & entrepreneur working at the intersection of cryptography, distributed systems, and smart contracts.
contributionDescription: While there are plenty of Solidity libraries out there, nobody has been working on high-quality, secure, and easy-to-integrate library-like Vyper code. ğŸ snekmate fundamentally changed this! In one sentence: ğŸ snekmate are state-of-the-art, highly opinionated, hyper-optimised, and secure Vyper smart contract building blocks. Or in other words: What OpenZeppelin is for Solidity, ğŸ snekmate is for Vyper. ğŸ snekmate has helped numerous Vyper builders to kick start on the OP stack. Not only does client diversity matter but also language diversity!

impactDescription:
The main impact of ğŸ snekmate are twofold:
1) ğŸ snekmate has built the secure foundations for any Vyper builder to kick start on the OP stack. Did you need an ERC-20 Vyper implementation for Optimism? Use ğŸ snekmate. Did you need some fancy math functions in Vyper for your AMM/DEX on Optimism? Use ğŸ snekmate. To put everything in one sentence: ğŸ snekmate has been the go-to-source for any Vyper code and ensured the security of the contracts with over 16k lines of unit, fuzzing & invariant tests. ğŸ snekmate has ensured that Vyper contracts deployed on Optimism follow the highest security standards and best practices.
2) ğŸ snekmate has become the go-to-source for educating and understanding Vyper code. The entire code base is enriched with explanatory comments, making it easy to grasp.
